channel.title: Pimpscape server help
channel.description:
2 questions!
1) How do i make it so max combat lvl is 126, i got all other levels to 99 max but can't fix combat. 2) wut is the code for npc to say if player is online or not, like how npc's say wut they do, or sell (like how when u type something and it pops above your head)
Thanks, Viper
